data.actual_result: The substitution message is sent to channel, the message is not edited
data.expected_result: foo is replaced with bar, no message is sent to the channel
data.short_description: Substitution editing breaks when attempting to edit a string ending with a backslash
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message containing some substring foo you wish to replace, which must end in a backslash - Send the substitution message ('s/foo/bar', where bar is the string you wish to substitute in for foo)
